articles.title: Queen news: Why the Queen doesn't own corgis any more - Express
articles.description: QUEEN ELIZABETH II lost one of her beloved dogs 'during lockdown', it was reported by the Sun today, leaving her with just one left. Why doesn't the Queen own corgis anymore?

articles.title: Queen's Christmas tradition began with faulty electrics at Windsor Castle - Express
articles.description: QUEEN ELIZABETH II's Christmas tradition of spending the festive period in Sandringham began in 1988.

articles.title: West End star Ruthie Henshall lifts the lid on her six-year romance with Prince Edward - Daily Mail
articles.description: As she emerged from I'm A Celebrity, Ruthie Henshall discovered that what she had thought was a casual private chat with fellow 'camper' Shane Richie hadn't, in fact, been private at all.
articles.content:

articles.title: Katie Price 'terrified' as rat launches across her lounge - The Argus
articles.description: KATIE Price was left shrieking in panic when a rat leapt out from underneath her mobility scooter.
